comments.content:
Please ask questions on solr-user mailing list before opening Jira issues. Once it is established that there is indeed a bug in Solr, only then open a Jira issue with complete details on the environment and steps to reproduce.

I'm marking this issue as invalid. We can re-open it if a genuine bug is found.
